author: Jax & Jackson
name: Minion Panic
bootlegger: Each night*, Minions choose a player: they die. In case of a tie, the kill is arbitrary. If there are less than 2 evil players alive, good wins. [No Demon. +1 Minion]

name: Minion Panic
ability: Each night*, Minions choose a player: they die. In case of a tie, the kill is arbitrary. If there are less than 2 evil players alive, good wins. [No Demon. +1 Minion]
otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions, allow them to choose who dies. In case of a tie, you choose.

jinxes.reason: When the Puzzlemaster makes a guess; if they would learn the demon, they instead learn a living minion
The kill made by the Minion Panic kill at night counts as a Demon kill to the Lycanthrope.
